content: Islam teaches peace and compassion for all.
The five daily prayers connect us to Allah.
Ramadan is a month of fasting and reflection.
Charity purifies the soul and helps others.
The Quran guides Muslims in daily life.
Hajj is a pilgrimage to the holy city of Mecca.
Prophet Muhammad taught kindness and mercy.
Faith requires both belief and good actions.
Muslims face Mecca when they pray.
The mosque is a place of worship and community.
Patience is a virtue highly praised in Islam.
Seeking knowledge is an obligation for all Muslims.
Honesty and integrity are core Islamic values.
Forgiveness is encouraged in Islamic teachings.
The Ummah refers to the global Muslim community.
